page.title: 13AMENITIES
page.content: {SERVICES}In Speke the following services are available: Fire, Police and Ambulance Stations, A Citizens Advice Bureau CAB, A Probation Office, Bus services 84, 82C, 81D, H1 and H25. Launderettes, A Health clinic, Doctors and Dentist, four old peoples homes, an I.T.C{(Intermediate Training {Centre),}Social Services Office, a Job Centre, Community Centre, Shopping arcade, Market and Library. {LEISURE AMENITIES} Leisure amenities in Speke are: The Community centre, Adventure playground, Sports Centre and Swimming pool, The Enterprise and a Park.{ {Boys Activities}include: Cubs, Scouts, Boxing, Marshal Arts and Football. {Girls activities}include: Brownies, Guides, Marshal Arts, Tennis and the Majorettes.
